text: (ibrāhīm metaram duraṭa pævasuvada) lut (nabi pamaṇakma) ohuva viśvāsa kaḷaha. (ebævin ibrāhīm ohuṭa) “niyata vaśayenma mā magē deviyangē balāporottuven (magē mema raṭa athæra damā) yannemi. niyata vaśayenma ohu (siyallanṭama) balasampannayeku hā gnānavantayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya” yayi pævasuvēya
